item.title: 消息称贝莱德支持的苏伊士停止出售中国水务资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Suez SA, a French water and waste-treatment company partly owned by BlackRock Inc., has paused a process to sell Chinese assets as it wants to keep growing in the world’s second-largest economy for longer, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商寒武纪销售额飙升 14 倍，英伟达被拒之门外
item.description: 汇川技术公司（Cambricon Technologies Corp. ）报告称，该公司的季度收入激增了 14 倍，这是最明显的迹象之一，表明在国内人工智能发展的热潮中，中国的芯片制造商正在从取代受限制的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Cambricon Technologies Corp. reported a 14-fold surge in quarterly revenue, one of the starkest signs yet of how China’s chipmakers are benefiting from a national drive to replace restricted Nvidia Corp. gear during a domestic AI development boom.】

item.title: 波兰拒绝向德国引渡北溪管道嫌疑人
item.description: 华沙地区法院拒绝将一名涉嫌参与破坏北溪天然气管道的乌克兰人引渡到德国。【原文：A Warsaw district court denied the extradition to Germany of a Ukrainian national suspected of involvement in the sabotage of the Nord Stream gas pipeline.】

item.title: 澳大利亚吸引华尔街公司参与中国多元化游戏
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）将于周五在纽约会见主要投资者，向全球资本推介澳大利亚是一个稳定、资源丰富的投资目的地，也是努力实现关键供应链多样化（远离中国）的重要合作伙伴。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers will meet with major investors in New York on Friday, pitching his country as a stable, resource-rich destination for global capital and a key partner in efforts to diversify critical supply chains away from China.】

item.title: 日本电力市场繁荣终于有望带来利润
item.description:
来自世界各地的电力交易商将于下周齐聚东京，以期在全球增长最快的能源市场之一占据一席之地。【原文：

Electricity traders from around the world will be in Tokyo next week to gain a foothold in one of the world’s fastest-growing energy markets.

】

item.title: 索纳、阿波罗做空汽车供应商 Adler Pelzer 的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，索纳资产管理公司（Sona Asset Management）、阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和阿克布鲁克资本公司（Axebrook Capital）等基金正在做空Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH的债务，押注这家汽车零部件制造商将难以为其债务进行再融资。【原文：Funds including Sona Asset Management, Apollo Global Management and Axebrook Capital are shorting the debt of Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH on a bet that the auto-parts manufacturer will struggle to refinance its debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对 SVB 式动荡的担忧使区域优先股成为焦点
item.description: Zions Bancorp 和 Western Alliance Bancorp 的问题使美国地区性银行的优先股成为关注焦点，人们担心该行业将出现上次硅谷银行倒闭时的大跌。【原文：Trouble at Zions Bancorp and Western Alliance Bancorp have put US regional banks’ preferred shares in the spotlight on concern the sector is poised for a selloff last seen when Silicon Valley Bank collapsed.】

item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，卡门-阿罗约（Carmen Arroyo）将报道人工智能热潮中鲜为人知的受益者之一。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们来看看对美元前期金融的最新评估。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, today we’re looking at the latest assessment’s of the dollar’s pre-eminance. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 智利的 1.17 亿美元骗局导致通胀预期下降
item.description: 过度热心的智利官员承认，他们在制定电费时重复计算了通货膨胀。这一供认使未来一年的价格增长预期低于 3% 的目标，并导致能源部长丢掉了工作。【原文：Over-zealous officials in Chile have admitted they double counted inflation when setting electricity rates. That confession sent price-growth expectations for a year ahead below the target 3%, and led the energy minister to lose his job.】

item.title: 地区性银行退缩，投资者重温 SVB 往事
item.description:
两家地区性贷款机构涉嫌贷款欺诈，这让原本就对信贷风险感到紧张的投资者感到震惊。【原文：

Suspected loan fraud at two regional lenders is alarming investors who were already nervous about credit risks.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯称下行风险使进一步降息成为可能
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，经济逆风可能要求欧洲中央银行在未来几个月进一步降低利率。【原文：Economic headwinds may require the European Central Bank to lower interest rates further in the months ahead, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 中国人民银行誓言采取措施促进人民币在全球的使用
item.description: 中国政府承诺为在岸和海外机构使用人民币提供更多便利，这也是在全球推广人民币的努力之一。【原文：Chinese authorities pledged to make it easier for onshore and overseas institutions to use the yuan, part of their push to promote the currency globally.】

item.title: 金属交易商迎来有史以来利润最高的一年
item.description: 在一系列供应动荡将价格推向历史新高并推动全球金属流动发生巨大变化之后，全球金属贸易商迎来了有史以来利润最高的一年。【原文：The world’s metal traders are enjoying their most profitable ever year, after a series of supply upheavals propelled prices toward record highs and drove huge shifts in metal moving across the globe.】

item.title: OpenAI 与博通和 AMD 的交易表明人工智能市场有多大
item.description: OpenAI与Advanced Micro Devices Inc.和Broadcom Inc.达成购买芯片的协议，表明人工智能行业的发展空间远远超出了头号巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：OpenAI’s agreements to buy chips from Advanced Micro Devices Inc. and Broadcom Inc. are demonstrating how much room the artificial intelligence industry has to grow beyond top dog Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷债务被一笔勾销，为 Invesco AT1 ETF 增色不少
item.description: 交易商们正在关注一只交易所交易基金，以获得瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）被清偿的额外一级债务的潜在赔偿资格。【原文：Traders are homing in on a single exchange-traded fund in their bid to qualify for potential compensation from the wiped-out Additional Tier 1 debt of Credit Suisse Group AG.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴和蚂蚁金服拟以 9.25 亿美元购买香港办公空间
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）和蚂蚁金服集团股份有限公司（Ant Group Co.【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Ant Group Co. have agreed to acquire several floors of an office tower in one of Hong Kong’s priciest districts for HK$7.2 billion ($925 million), as the Chinese tech leaders ramp up investment in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 英格兰银行首席经济学家敦促放慢降息步伐
item.description: 英格兰银行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，在通胀胶着的风险日益加剧的情况下，政策制定者应采取更加谨慎的态度来放宽借贷成本。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said policymakers should take a more cautious approach to easing borrowing costs amid a growing risk of sticky inflation.】

item.title: 怡和集团收购文华东方酒店剩余股份
item.description: 怡和控股有限公司（Jardine Matheson Holdings Ltd.）已同意收购其尚未持有的文华东方国际有限公司（Mandarin Oriental International Ltd.）剩余的 11.96% 的股份，这家拥有百年历史的集团正加大力度提高投资者回报。【原文：Jardine Matheson Holdings Ltd. has agreed to buy the remaining 11.96% of hotel arm Mandarin Oriental International Ltd. it doesn’t already own, as the century-old group ramps up its efforts to increase investor returns.】

item.title: 法国推动欧洲再次推迟银行交易资本规则
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国正在向欧盟施压，要求欧盟第三次推迟实施对银行提出更高资本要求的新规定，认为目前的时间表将使欧盟的贷款机构处于不公平的不利地位。【原文：France is pressing the European Union for a third delay on new rules that will impose higher capital requirements on banks, arguing the current timeline will put the bloc’s lenders at an unfair disadvantage, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼在最新刺激计划中增加 18 亿美元现金援助
item.description: 印尼将额外发放30万亿印尼盾（约合18亿美元）的现金援助，在就业市场疲软和工资增长乏力的焦虑日益加剧的情况下，加大力度刺激消费支出。【原文：Indonesia will distribute an additional 30 trillion rupiah ($1.8 billion) in cash aid, intensifying efforts to spur consumer spending amid increasing anxiety over the weak job market and tepid wage growth.】

item.title: 巴西伊塔乌集团支持 Turbi 汽车租赁公司上市
item.description: 巴西初创公司 Turbi 提供按小时计费的汽车租赁服务，该公司获得了由 Itau Unibanco Holding SA 主导的 1.56 亿雷亚尔（2,900 万美元）的本地票据发行，为其国内扩张提供资金，并为潜在的公开发行做准备。【原文：Brazilian startup Turbi, which offers car rentals by the hour, secured a 156 million-real ($29 million) local note issuance anchored by Itau Unibanco Holding SA to fund its domestic expansion and prepare for a potential public offering.】

item.title: 鲍威尔支持 2025 年降息，然后事情变得阴云密布
item.description: 美联储准备在本月再次降息，因为目前就业市场的疲软超过了对通货膨胀的担忧。但这种平衡可能维持不了多久。【原文：The Federal Reserve is ready to cut interest rates again this month, because right now a weakening job market outweighs inflation fears. But that balance may not hold for very long.】

item.title: 加拿大财政部长称预算将 "吸引 "私人投资
item.description: 加拿大财政部长表示，他即将出台的财政计划旨在 "吸引 "私人投资，因为联邦政府将增加重大项目的资本支出并削减法规。【原文：Canada’s finance minister says his upcoming fiscal plan aims to “crowd in” private investment as the federal government ramps up capital spending on major projects and cuts regulations.】

item.title: 美国银行困境和政治风险消退推动法国和英国债券上涨
item.description: 受周五美国地区银行健康状况存疑引发的避险情绪推动，法国和英国债券将迎来今年表现最好的一周之一。【原文：French and UK bonds are on course for one of their best weeks this year, propelled by Friday’s rush for safety spurred by doubts over the health of regional US banks.】

item.title: 投资者欢呼萨瓦德尔收购失败，BBVA 创 2007 年新高
item.description: 在收购竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的竞购失败后，BBVA SA 的股价飙升至 18 年来的最高水平，投资者为一年半的不确定性结束以及更高的派息前景而欢呼雀跃。【原文：BBVA SA’s shares soared to the highest level in 18 years after its takeover bid for rival Banco Sabadell SA collapsed as investors cheered the end to a year and a half of uncertainty and the prospect of higher payouts.】

item.title: 分析师对企业利润实力的信心与日俱增
item.description: 华尔街的分析师们对美国公司的底线越来越乐观，尽管人们越来越担心经济基础不稳，人工智能的主导地位掩盖了表面下的问题。【原文：Wall Street analysts are growing more optimistic about Corporate America’s bottom line, even as worries mount that the economy is on shaky footing and AI dominance is masking troubles beneath the surface.】

item.title: 日本丸红就收购凯雷投资的 TiAuto 进行谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本丸红株式会社（Marubeni Corp.【原文：Japan’s Marubeni Corp. is in talks to acquire Carlyle Inc.-backed TiAuto Investments Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 决胜投票后，后社会主义玻利维亚将面临重大经济考验
item.description: 玻利维亚周日举行的总统选举将结束一个社会主义政府长达二十年的统治。但是，选民和投资者对变革前景的欣喜很快就会被现实的艰难转变所取代。【原文：Bolivia’s presidential election Sunday will bring an end to two decades of rule by a socialist government that ran the economy into the ground. But the giddiness of voters and investors over the prospects of change will soon give way to the reality of a difficult turnaround.】

item.title: 投资者为财报做好准备，美国银行股跌势加深
item.description: 周五，美国银行股在盘前交易中延续跌势，此前地区性银行股大幅下挫，并在亚洲和欧洲交易时段引起反响。【原文：US bank stocks extended their slide in premarket trading on Friday, after a sharp selloff in regional lenders that reverberated through Asian and European trading hours.】
